column3: “i love this strain...a great heady high to be enjoyed all day long or all night long..can work high all night on this wonderful strain. .i strongly recommend”

“A great cross of Blue Dream productive and creative, with the added Spacey body Buzz. great afternoon video game session with friends strain. definitely happy, and not noticing usual aches and pains. similar vibe to Snoops dream”

“Very nice flavor, in this cross between Blue Dream and  Northern Lights #5. It's sativa dominant, but yet still fairly heavy enough for nighttime use but does not promote drowsiness for the most part.

Very nice blue/purple type of smell and flavor with a buzz similar to permafrost. A good hybrid for all around use, with to me what seems to be a bit on the heavier side for a sativa which is what I prefer. In other ...”

“Everyone's problems aren't the same. Everyone has problems just the same. Everyone can't seem to realize, that the problem is in fact in front of them. 
A reflection of themselves on a mirror. Can't stand to look at yourself
So you look to blame some one else. 
Instead of looking straight a head, you look into your abyss of your soul. 
You take rip out songs new toy, And to my heart I see a bag of blue boy waiting fo...”
“I didn't care for this strain. I didn't even notice a high. Maybe, I just had a bad batch but I'm going to avoid this strain in the future.”

“@MoaniNaturals #MoaniNaturals 
#BlueBoy 
Purchased from @Hwy420 

Label: 
70% - #Sativa 
30% - #Indica
#Hybrid 
#THC - 23.32%
#CBD - 0.41%
Total: 24.08%
There is some other percentages on this label but too difficult to read.  Secondly,  the packaging says #FatPack which the processors call 1.1 grams a fat pack. WTF? A fat pack is like 1.2 or 1.3 but 1.1??  Really??  I guess that extra weight comes from the terribly ...”
“I tried this for stress relief. It was definitely a creeper, but ended up making me even more anxious. Smooth smoke, but not for me.”
“very good energizing high! had me super productive at work”

“I'm trying some outdoor grown in BC Canada. nice buds, brownish colour. smells earthy with hints of berry and mint.
northern lights is a personal favorite of mine, this definitely takes after its parent with a fruitier, mintier flavour. 
I'd grab again! indoor or outdoor”
“Super chill high made me feel great after a long day of work.”
“This shit have me the worst anxiety I've literally ever had after smoking. Horrible. Not for me.”
“dank....”
“I love it down on tasting it”
“fun strain nice taste but lacked the high i was hoping for”
“decent, a Lil leafy”
“One snapper had me paused, and then a whole bowl had me good. Definitely felt the resemblance to Blue Dream.”
“Gives you a very heady high with just a little body buzz. Great for a wake and bake. Got me out of bed and straight into some homework. Best productivity high I've ever had.”
“Gives me an intense head high but it's accompanied with a bad headache and pressure around my sinuses. Overall I'm not all that big of a fan. But hey that's just me.”
“Smooth smoke, great taste and good high. Stress relief pain relief all day relief”

“This strain was amazing. Really helped with my knee problem (I have had complete knee re constructive surgery) and it really did the job. Great cross between body and head high. Two thumbs up for this.”
“made my eyes hella red but a good high with plenty of tinglies.”
“keeping me  going to get stuff done 10”
“UK Blues”
“My favorite strain”
“my all time favorite thc can get well past 20% and it is a deep relaxing high that last for hours.”
“It is very smooth tasting.”

“I'm very relaxed, nice mellow body high.  I especially appreciate how I feel my muscles just sort of melting into relaxation.  This helps a lot with my back pain in that sense (because it's musco-skeletal tension).  

The first time I smoked it and I got a bit anxious.  Just a couple solid puffs.  I generally vaporize my herb.  Vaping it, I don't feel anxious.

I have brutal cotton mouth.”

“My favorite strain is Blue Dream so I was excited when I got the chance to smoke this! Northern Lights is a good strain too.. I just feel a little anxious when the high started but I was already high on a top indica strain for a sleep aid so that could've been the reason but by far I say the cross breed names should rate itself💨”

“What a unique and special strain! In some ways, this strain is more Sativa-like than many pure Sativa's because the high is so cerebral, creative, happy, sociable, talkative; and, because the corresponding body high is so minimal: No discernable sleepiness, heaviness, or inertia. I can be productive and focused if I need to be, or playful and creative (which is what I generally roll with).   This magical herb I smoke...”
“Strong red eyes for me to, nice taste and head high.”

“Great strain. Has a relaxed, laid back feel with subtle hints of creative, cerebral sensations. Makes you happy. The high isn't very strong when it hits you. You sort of glide into it without really noticing at first. I think this is an okay strain to use before bed. Very relaxing.”
“Yesssss”
“It hits hard, harsh on my throat. definitely have some burning and lots of coughing. It's not a bad strain, but it wears off quickly”

“good hybrid, but maybe not as classic as Snoops dream? Definitely got a few chuckles this time, and some energy. However, didn't get as much pain relief as last time. solid 4.5 strain. Not sure I'd be looking to pay a premium price for it. unless somehow I'm saving sea creatures by smoking it.”
“Happy giggly fun! Talkative and uplifting. This is my current favorite. No negative effects that I can think of. Maybe a bit of dry eye but that was solved with the tears from laughter.”
“Nice n mellow hit. Relaxing. Quick head rush at beginning. Nice body buzz. Felt nice while in hot tub. Feel it heavy in my eyes.”

“i purchased this looking for an easy-smoking sleep aid/pain relief. it provided both of these things without an overly intense body high, which i also appreciated. while i did wake the next morning with a headache, it is too early in my use of this strain to draw a definite link.”

“The high was decent, the percentage is right around 26 percent. For me, this strain is a creeper. It took nearly 20 minutes after I finished a joint of this to feel it. It is definitely a strain that I would smoke again if it was given to me”
“I will definitely buy this one again! I loved it.”
“This weed is awesome so dense and awesome taste. Sent my head to the moon and it lasted a long time.”

“Not a super big fan of this one. Like others said it gave me a killer headache and terrible red eyes. The initial 15-20 minutes gave me terrible anxiety to the point of having panic attacks. After trying it a couple more times they stopped but at first it was terrible. But I'm more prone to anxiety with certain strands, so anyone else might love it, it just wasn't me favorite.”
“Grown by Happy Hill- sooooo good. Probably my new favorite. Makes everything that feels good feel even better. Feels incredibly clear minded. A++++ strain for me.”

“I'm trying some outdoor grown in BC Canada. nice buds, brownish colour. smells earthy with hints of berry and mint.
northern lights is a personal favorite of mine, this definitely takes after its parent with a fruitier, mintier flavour. 
I'd grab again! indoor or outdoor”

“WOW! What a most on usual and sensational strain, from the taste, to the next few hours.  Best Yet. 

No matter what the strain I was always left ready to sack out at the end of the high, the strain gives me so much energy and doesn’t leave me feeling tired at all. It seems like you can control your mind or let your imagination run away so we can be a wicked heavy high like a cerebral high or a highly functioning hig...”
“very good energizing high! had me super productive at work”
“I tried this for stress relief. It was definitely a creeper, but ended up making me even more anxious. Smooth smoke, but not for me.”
